Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: "A tool whose main purpose is to provide a quick and dirty way for coders to give staffers a tool for tweaking an object in the world.\\r\\n\\r\\nFor example, the \\"host\\" feature is a form which allows staffers to customize their staff bodies (by typing +feature host in me)."
"+feature host in me\\r\\n Bring up the feature form \\"host\\" in the person typing.\\r\\n"
